entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: WSW 69 km/h gust 85 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard near Lake Ontario early this evening. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
